title: simple, but not recommended
comment: I used to recommend this app to people for its simplicity, but it being single-address turned out to be a problem; everyone who ever had a transaction with you can see all your other transactions and current balance and know that it is your address you control. I had someone buy bitcoins from me for cash, then call me months later and ask for the 4 remaining bitcoins in this wallet.  Something not possible if it made proper use of multiple change addresses like almost all bitcoin wallets did.
Not working on my Note 2

title: warning This app steals your bitcoins.. via vunrebility
comment: I have just traced this app back to stealing my £500 bitcoins. it is even still accessing my phone today after I uninstalled it 2 days ago. you will need to format your phone back to factory settings.

title: SecureRandom
comment: Please at least make an update to inform your 5000 users that their money is at risk due to SecureRandom.

title: Best lightweight wallet app
comment: Simple, easy to use, FAAAST... and free as in freedom!  I've been using Bitcoin Spinner for over one year now without a glitch. Thanks!

title: Transaction fee algorithm is a ripoff
comment: DO NOT USE.  The algorithm this app uses to determine the MANDATORY transaction fee will eat any BTC you are foolish enough to keep in this wallet.  I had to abandon a .013 BTC wallet because the app wouldn't EVER let old inpits stabilize.  If you want to give away money, plenty of charities will at least tnank you for it

title: Very Simple and Reliable
comment: Bitcoin Spinner is what all mobile wallets should be.  It is decentralized, easy to install, open source, reliable, and has all the essential tools you need, including QR Code scanning and backup export.  It doesn't try to download the blockchain, which is essential for saving storage space, and sends and receives transactions quickly.  However, there are two things I would like to see in future versions: the ability to sign off-line transactions and the ability to create new addresses.  Most other clients let you make as many address as you want, and show you the combined balance of all of them.  Furthermore, sometimes, you're not connected to the internet, and you want to send a transaction, and offline signing would enable that.  Despite missing those two features, Bitcoin Spinner is still better than all other mobile apps out there hands down.

title: Great way to store and use bitcoins
comment: This application works great and has all the important features of the desktop client.   I would make one recommendation for improvement to the Transaction History screen.  For incoming transactions (ie deposits) miners in pools will see every other address that the block of coins was paid to as well as their own address in the "Sent To:" column.  This can amount to thousands of other addresses which is really worthless information to the wallet account holder.   It would make sense to filter out all the other addresses and collapse them down to a "more..." button or something so the transaction list does not become so long and bloated with needless detail.  In my case, I have to scroll down many pages to see the next deposit information for each mining payout.  This has made the Transaction History load very slow and become almost unusable.

title: Update broke everything
comment: The latest version causes a Force Close event after returning from a QR scanning app.

title: Galaxy Tab 2: My prefered wallet to date
comment: My preferred choice of Wallet for a while now.  I concur with others, this is a great App but it should have as a priority the ability to be able to change the default transaction fee since prices go up the fee borders on ridiculous. So any future update must have this ability added in, just like a lot of other Wallets now.  And yes please add in lanscape and portrait mode,  Apart from that its a great App, cheers.

title: Great app
comment: Needs option to change or disable minor fee. Other than that it works great!

title: Need to be able to override the transaction fee
comment: With the price of bitcoin at $200 we need to be able to manually set or override the transaction fee. 0.0005 is currently equal to USD$0.10 - which is too high for small transactions, and the problem is only going to get worse as the price of bitcoins rises.
QR code scanning does not work when sending coins

title: Landscape mode request!
comment: Bitcoin moves to tablets too, so please, make the landscape mode with page-swype navigation between send, receive, address book etc. Looking forward To the Next update!

title: OK, but limited
comment: My only beef is I can't add addresses without a QR code. Maybe I need a text to QR translator. Or another wallet.

title: Great Bitcoin Software!
comment: Easy to use, light on resources, no blockchain download and easy to back up.  My only feature request is landscape viewing mode.  Thanks again.

title: The best

title: Worked perfect till upgrade.
comment: Updated and sent 2 coins 24 hours later still unconfirmed.  Nothing will send.  Previously great app.  Update:  bugfix.  Got all coins back.  Upgrade actually made the fix for the previous error that was occurring.

title: Best portable Bitcoin wallet I have found.
comment: Works great! I have not found a problem with it. Have been using it for a couple months now. Much better than the competition.

title: Poor
comment: If you say the transaction fee is a certain price that's what it should be. Period. Not unexpected error bc u want more

title: Best bitcoin app
comment: Very fast, reliable and lightweight

title: Light, easy to use and stable
comment: Works perfectly on my Galaxy Nexus.

title: Perfect android client.
comment: Bitcoin Spinner is very straightforward and easy to use.  The private key is stored locally on your device, but the blockchain is handled by the Bitcoin Spinner server.  This is a great way for you to be in control your private keys, but not to have to deal with the blockchain download on a mobile device.

title: the best
comment: such a small app and it does it all.my favorite

title: my favorite
comment: slim and simply easy.love it

title: No dice.
comment: This app never loaded a bitcoin address, just sat there spinning. Perhaps that explains the name.  Tried clearing all data and reinstalling. Still didn't work.   Oh, well.

title: Best Bitcoin app to date
comment: The best Bitcoin app to date, by far. Its feature set is limited but well-implemented. Features I would like to see: * import private keys * generate new keys * change miner fee settings  I'd also like the ability to change the server it hits, but I understand that it uses BCCAPI, which I don't believe is an open implementation. Electrum is an open alternative, and I'd like to see a re-implementation of this app that uses it.

title: Bitcoin made easy!
comment: Look no further. This is the Android bitcoin app to use!

comment: The bug is fixed! BitcoinSpinner is now the best bitcoin wallet for Android; simple and slick! Droid X.

comment: Fast, light, works

title: very nice and easy to use
comment: well done, very simple, covers the basics.  address book and some tiny things are missing. Remember, that you have to trust the server (he can't steal, but maybe cheat). Don't forget to donate!

title: Unable to install on TMobile/Samsung Galaxy S
comment: It's not listed in the market when I search and if I try to download it from the web, it says it's not compatible with my device. What's up? I really need this app! Please/Thanks!

title: Works beautifully
comment: Works very well. Very responsive and I love that a backup has to be made only once at installation time and is good for ever.

title: Good start
comment: Needs to let you select a server to use, and needs to allow you to choose how much you want to spend on transaction processing fees, but otherwise this is a much better approach than storing the blockchain on your phone.

title: mandatory fee
comment: There is a built-in fee for every transaction. It is .05 BTC if I recall. I would like an option to turn off the processing fee and pay 0 BTC processing. Great app otherwise, but this fee prevents me from using the app.

comment: Excellent. Lightweight and fast.
